anya-e0501n3:1_0: Katamo anantarapaccayo. Anantare khaṇe niruddho citta cetasikadhammasamūho anantarapaccayo.
anya-e0501n3:2_1: Pacchime anantare eva khaṇe uppanno cittacetasikadhammasamūho tassa paccayassa paccayuppanno.
anya-e0501n3:3_0: Ekasmiṁ bhave paṭisandhicittaṁ paṭhamabhavaṅgacittassa anantara paccayo,
anya-e0501n3:4_0: Yadā pana dhammayamake suddhāvāsānaṁ dutiye akusale citte vattamāneti vuttanayena tassa sattassa attano
anya-e0501n3:4_1: abhinavaṁ attabhāvaṁ ārabbha etaṁ mama esohamasmi eso me attāti pavattaṁ bhavanikantika taṇhāsahagatacittaṁ
anya-e0501n3:5_0: Api ca so satto tadā paccuppannabhave kiñci na jānāti,
anya-e0501n3:5_1: pubbabhave attanā anubhūtaṁ ārammaṇaṁ anussaramāno acchati.
anya-e0501n3:5_2: Vatthussa pana atidubbalattā tañca ārammaṇaṁ aparibyattameva hoti.
anya-e0501n3:6_0: Yadā gabbho thokaṁ vaḍḍhamāno hoti atirekadvemāsaṁ gato,
anya-e0501n3:6_2: Evaṁ santepi mātugabbhe ālokādīnaṁ paccayānaṁ abhāvato cakkhuviññāṇādīni cattāri viññāṇāni nuppajjanti,
anya-e0501n3:6_4: So satto mātuyā iriyāpathaparivattanādīsu bahūni dukkhadomanassāni paccanubhoti.
anya-e0501n3:6_8: tāva so atimandarūpo uttānaseyyako hutvā acchati.
anya-e0501n3:6_10: Yebhuyyena purima bhavānusārī eva tassa viññāṇaṁ hoti.
anya-e0501n3:6_11: Sace so niraya bhavato āgato hoti,
anya-e0501n3:6_13: Purimāni nirayārammaṇāni ārabbha khaṇe khaṇe virūpamukhamassa paññāyati.
anya-e0501n3:7_3: Tadā amandarūpo hutvā kīḷanto līḷanto modanto pamodanto acchati.
anya-e0501n3:8_0: Kiṁ pana sabbopi satto imasmiṁ ṭhāne eva purimaṁ jātiṁ pamussatīti ce.
anya-e0501n3:8_1: Na sabbopi satto imasmiṁ ṭhāne eva pamussati.
anya-e0501n3:8_2: Koci atirekataraṁ gambhavāsadukkhena paripīḷito gabbhe eva pamussati.
anya-e0501n3:9_1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ sallakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya chadvārikavīthi cittāni paripuṇṇāni pavattanti.
anya-e0501n3:9_2: Sabbatthapi purimaṁ purimaṁ anantare niruddhaṁ cittaṁ pacchimassa pacchimassa anantare uppannassa cittassa anantara paccayo hoti.
anya-e0501n3:9_3: Ayañca anantarapaccayo nāma anamatagge saṁsāre ekassa sattassa ekappabandho eva hoti.
anya-e0501n3:9_4: Yadā satto arahatta maggaṁ labhitvā khandhaparinibbānaṁ pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0501n3:10_2: Attano anantare attasadisassa dhammantarassa uppādanaṭṭhena anantaro,
anya-e0501n3:10_4: Tattha attasadisassāti sārammaṇa bhāvena attanā sadisassa.
anya-e0501n3:10_5: Sārammaṇabhāvenāti ca yo dhammo ārammaṇena vinā na pavattati,
anya-e0501n3:10_8: Dhammantarassa uppādanaṭṭhenāti purimasmiṁ citte niruddhepi tassa cintanakiriyāvego na vūpasammati,
anya-e0501n3:11_0: Tattha purimā purimā mātuparamparā viya anantarapaccayaparamparā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0501n3:11_1: Pacchimā pacchimā dhītuparamparā viya tassa paccayuppannaparamparā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0501n3:11_2: Evaṁ sante arahantānaṁ sabbapacchimaṁ parinibbānacittampi puna paṭisandhicittasaṅkhātaṁ dhammantaraṁ uppādeyyāti.
anya-e0501n3:11_4: tadā kammakilesavegānaṁ sabbaso paṭippassaddhibhāvena accantasantatarattā tassa cittassāti.
